site.description: Update site for MinimalEcore, EFactory, eJava, EMFCustomize and EMFDoc.

category-def.name: EMFCustomize
category-def.label: EMFCustomize
category-def.description: EMFCustomize allows to implement operations for EMF Ecore models using the plain Eclipse Java JDT editor while preserving a clean separation between generated and hand-written code.

category-def.name: EMFDoc
category-def.label: EMFDoc
category-def.description: EMFDoc can be used to document Ecore models.

category-def.name: eJava
category-def.label: eJava
category-def.description: eJava is a specification language for eOperation bodys in Ecore models.

category-def.name: MinimalEcore
category-def.label: MinimalEcore
category-def.description: MinimalEcore is a compact textual syntax for Ecore models.

category-def.name: EFactory
category-def.label: EFactory
category-def.description: EFactory is a generic language to create instances of arbitrary Ecore models.

category-def.name: EMF/Ecore Utilities
category-def.label: EMF/Ecore Utilities
category-def.description: EMF/Ecore Utilities is a collections of utility classes for handling Ecore models.
